name: The Last Mercenary (SAE Institute Dubai)
description:
The Last Mercenary is a third person tower defense hybrid game where players take on the role of a former outlaw who has been hired by his kingdom to protect its walls from waves of enemy forces. This project challenged us to integrate storytelling techniques into a short gameplay experience while also creating a variety of AI that follow a wave system.

Credits:

Game Designed by Jonas Noronha

Game Programmers

Aniketh Gondesi, Vishnu Raveendran & Christos Pishiri

Music Composed by Jason Baretto and Denver Perera

Animators
Dalia Abdelmeguid, Najeeb Al-Shalchi & Chaitanya Prabhakar

Voice Actors
Nader Baraday & Samuel Sabu

Collaborators
Zachary Salazar, Kayton Date, Salma Eneim, S. Sen & Brad Mesina

Special Thanks to our Lecturers:
Ahmed Fouad, Muhammed Hamze, Bing Ratnapala & Rashed Hindash
